original: @30a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @30a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sampa ra tsakra a'a li k'a li mah'a yo ga bha ba na n'a ma /
analyzed: sampa ra tsakra a'a li k'a li mah'a yo ga bha ba na n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: aa phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: aa phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba /

original: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Heruka.

original: 'khor ba'i thog mtha'i tshad nad ni //üîΩbde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i thog mtha'i tshad nad ni // bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi //
translated: The beginning and end of samsara's illnessüîΩIs removed by the nectar of the nature of great bliss,

original: rgya mtsho lta bu'i bdud rtsis sel //
analyzed: rgya mtsho lta bu'i bdud rtsis sel //
translated: Which is like an ocean.

original: dga' chen de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dga' chen de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to that great joy.

original: dpal ldan phag mo'i snying po yis //
analyzed: dpal ldan phag mo'i snying po yis //
translated: The essence of the glorious Varahi

original: bde chen dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes //
analyzed: bde chen dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes //

original: dpa' bo dpa' mo nyi shu bzhis //
analyzed: dpa' bo dpa' mo nyi shu bzhis //

original: sa mu dra yi lus nyid la //
analyzed: sa mu dra yi lus nyid la //
translated: In the body of the ocean

original: go cha drug gi rgyas btab la //
analyzed: go cha drug gi rgyas btab la //
translated: Are sealed with the six armors.

original: yi ge bdun pa'i rna rgyan can //
analyzed: yi ge bdun pa'i rna rgyan can //
translated: They have earrings of the seven syllables.

original: dpal ldan phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni //
analyzed: dpal ldan phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni //
translated: With the mantra garland of the glorious one,

original: mgo phreng bzhi bcu rtsa dgus brgyan //
analyzed: mgo phreng bzhi bcu rtsa dgus brgyan //

original: glang po che yi ga yang gzhi ni //
analyzed: glang po che yi ga yang gzhi ni //

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro 'dzin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro 'dzin //
translated: The dakinis of all buddhas are held.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi rig pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi rig pa ni //

original: rnal 'byor rgya mtshos rked rgyan byas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgya mtshos rked rgyan byas //

original: thod phreng ye shes lnga yin te //
analyzed: thod phreng ye shes lnga yin te //

original: bde gshegs lnga yis spyi bor brgyan //
analyzed: bde gshegs lnga yis spyi bor brgyan //

original: s'a ga ra bdag gar byed do //
analyzed: s'a ga ra bdag gar byed do //

original: tshangs spyod rtag tu bsrung byas nas //
analyzed: tshangs spyod rtag tu bsrung byas nas //

original: rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med bsam //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med bsam //

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags mchod bya //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags mchod bya //

original: bdag nyid rnal 'byor s'a ga ra //
analyzed: bdag nyid rnal 'byor s'a ga ra //

original: dur khyod brgyad du gnas byed kyang //
analyzed: dur khyod brgyad du gnas byed kyang //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis tag tu rtogs //

original: rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //

analyzed: seng ge bzhin du rtag tu spyod //

analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po bsre byas nas //
